IRM 4.32.4, Abusive Transactions, IRC 6707A Penalty for Failure to Include Reportable Transaction Information With Return, dated 02-11-2016, is obsolete as of the date of this transmittal.

This section provides guidance for Small Business and Self-Employed (SB/SE) Examination area office employees, Tax Exempt and Governmental Entities (TE/GE) employees, and Large Business and International (LB&I) employees.
Deborah J. Ngo Director, Promoter Investigations SE:S:DCE:OPI Small Business/Self
